FrageText.de: Wie werden Sie sich bei einem Stau in einem Tunnel verhalten?
FrageText.en: How would you conduct yourself in a traffic jam in a tunnel?
FrageText.hr: Kako ćete postupiti prilikom zastoja u tunelu?
FrageText.sl: Kako boste v predoru ravnali v primeru zastoja?

de.Text: Umkehren und rasch aus dem Tunnel fahren
Anhalten und Motor laufen lassen, um den Tunnel rasch verlassen zu können
Aussteigen und die Ursache des Staus erkunden

en.Text: Turn around and drive quickly out of the tunnel
Come to a stop while leaving the engine running in order to be able to quickly leave the tunnel
Come to a stop and turn off the engine
Leave your vehicle and find out what the cause of the traffic jam is

hr.Text: Polukružno se okrenuti i (vozilom) brzo izići iz tunela
Zaustaviti se i pustiti da motor radi, da se tunel brzo može napustiti

sl.Text: Ustavim in pustim motor prižgan, da bi lahko čimprej zapustil predor
Izstopim in poizvem za vzrok zastoja

tr.Text: Geri döner ve hemen tünelden dışarı çıkarım
Tüneli hemen terk edebilmek için motor çalışır vaziyette dururum
